text:
FEDERAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION
WASHINGTON, D.C. 20554
September 16, 1968
IN REPLY REFER TO:
Mr. William G. Harley
President
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Bill:
I appreciate your comments on the NATRA speech.
And I continue to read enthusiastically Ken Clark's minority
programming reports.
I have told Bob Mott that I will let NAEB know around
October 11 whether I can participate in the convention. If it
works out I tentatively plan to give a paper on the financing question.
Please let me know if this raises any problems.
Sirice rely,
N Dias Johnson
Commissioner
